channel.title: Networks on Network Development Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Networks on Network Development Engineer

item.title: iAmAlive Script ( APIC-EM & Tropo API )
item.description: iAmAlive Script iAmAlive script confirms if a host is reachable and triggers a collaborative action via Tropo; Tropo will send an sms to the network admin if the host is reachable or call the network admin if the host is unreachable. The idea is to demonstrate the capabilities of APIC-EM [^1] as well as Tropo APIs and how they can be leveraged on to facilitate collaboration within distributed teams. Flow Prerequisites Python Tropo Account with Outbound SMS and Call capabilities APIC-EM always on logins [^2]- sandboxapic.

item.title: SIP over MPLS - Service Implementation
item.description: Wilber O. Wanjira1 and Juma O. Kevin2 Principal Engineer - Integration1 and Senior Engineer - Core Planning (Voice)2 Introduction In this document, we share the deployed network architecture to provide SIP over MPLS. This model adopts the SIP protocol as signaling to set up a call and MPLS as a core network forwarding mechanism. SIP over MPLS will provide an alternative to SIP over dedicated Internet Access (the current and more typical deployment approach).
